title: Entire area of plot may be considered for calculating the potential of plot in respect of premium FSI + TDR, but not the basic FSI
clause_text: Entire area of plot may be considered for calculating the potential of plot in respect of premium FSI + TDR, but not the basic FSI. Basic FSI shall be calculated on area of the plot remaining with the owner after deducting area under D.P. road / road widening / reservations and amenity space. This shall be applicable in cases where reservation area or amenity space is handed over to the authority.
section: Impact Assessment and Integrated Mobility Plan

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
